name: Tall Red, White & Blue Lamp
description:
This gorgeous ceramic lamp is hand painted in a beautiful red, blue and white floral pattern. It sits on a small wooden base painted with a deep black lacquer. 
 
It comes with a lovely white barrel shade, hand picked to compliment the lamp's unique and striking features.
 
Height: 22.5 inches (from bottom to top of socket)

Original Price: $60.00

name: Wooden Accent Light
description:
This accent light is a favorite at Lucas Lamps!

This beautiful and very unique accent light features a beige scalloped glass globe sitting atop an upturned, antique wooden vase. This most certainly a one of a kind piece.
 
Height: 15 inches

Original Price: $85.00

name: Tall Red, White & Blue Barrel Lamp
description:
This gorgeous barrel-shaped vase is hand painted in a red, blue and white floral pattern. It sits atop a beautiful, intricately carved wooden base painted with deep black lacquer.
 
It comes with a lovely white pleated shade, hand picked to compliment the lamp's unique features.
 
Height: 22.5 inches (from bottom to top of socket)

Original Price: $65.00

name: Barbed Wire Star Set
description:
These barbed wire star silhouettes were made from recycled barbed wire, reclaimed from a horse and cattle ranch in northeast Texas.

Measurements from left to right in picture:
    * small single strand (12")
    * small triple strand (12")
    * large double strand (24")
    * small criss-cross single strand (12")

Sold as a set of 4 stars.

Original Price: $40.00
